text: Opting for a bold fuchsia color, Kate Middleton looked stunning at Princess Eugenie's royal wedding to Jack Brooksbank today. The Duchess of Cambridge stuck to her go - to designers and wore an Alexander McQueen dress and Philip Treacy hat for the occasion. Topping off her look, Kate accessorized with a matching fuchsia fascinator and veil paired with classic black pumps and a clutch. Her McQueen dress featured a pleated waistline and puffed sleeves. Typically one to stick to a neutral color palette, the look made for an unexpected splash of color for the Duchess of Cambridge.
